tags.name: Get Alerts by Ruleset
tags.description: Returns all of the alerts from the Clickhouse table ‘alert_topic’ appended to the ruleset ID specified by the ruleset_id parameter.

tags.name: Get Alerts by Ruleset Paged
tags.description: Returns all of the alerts from the Clickhouse table ‘alert_topic’ appended to the ruleset ID specified by the ruleset_id parameter. The num parameter is used for the page number to determine the offset and the size parameter is how many alerts are retrieved from the table.

tags.name: Get Alert Count by Ruleset ID
tags.description: Returns all of the alerts from the Clickhouse table ‘alert_topic’ appended to the ruleset ID specified by the ruleset_id parameter

tags.name: Get Alert by Alert ID
tags.description: Returns a specific Alert based on the Alert ID

tags.name: Get Events by Ruleset
tags.description: Returns all of the events from the Clickhouse table ‘event_topic’ appended to the ruleset ID specified by the ruleset_id parameter.

tags.name: Get Events by Ruleset Paged
tags.description: Returns all of the events from the Clickhouse table ‘event_topic’ appended to the ruleset ID specified by the ruleset_id parameter. The num parameter is used for the page number to determine the offset and the size parameter is how many alerts are retrieved from the table.

tags.name: Get Events from Ruleset by Alert ID
tags.description: Returns the alert from the Clickhouse table ‘event_topic’ appended to the ruleset ID specified by the ruleset_id parameter.  filtered by the alert_id specified by the alert_id parameter

tags.name: Get Events from Ruleset by User
tags.description: Returns all of the events from the Clickhouse table ‘event_topic’ filtered by the user id specified by the user_id parameter

tags.name: Get Users
tags.description: Returns the User ID, User Name, Social Media Source and Max ID of all of the accounts that are currently being followed

tags.name: Get Users by Social Media
tags.description: Returns the User ID, User Name, Social Media Source and Max ID of all of the accounts that are currently being followed by Social Media

tags.name: Get User by ID
tags.description: Returns the User ID, User Name, Social Media Source and Max ID of a specific tracked account based on User ID

tags.name: Insert User
tags.description: Inserts the User ID, User Name, Social Media Source and Max ID of an account to follow that user

tags.name: Delete User
tags.description: Deletes the tracked account from the table based on their User ID and Social Media Source

tags.name: Update Max ID of User
tags.description: Updates the Max ID field of a User based on their User ID. The Max ID is used to get the latest tweet received from the user

tags.name: Get User Message by ID
tags.description: Gets all of the User messages based on the User ID and the Social Media Source

tags.name: Get Users Paged
tags.description: Returns the User ID, User Name and Max ID of all of the accounts that are currently being followed. This gets a limited amount of the Users based on parameters

tags.name: Get User Count
tags.description: Returns the amount of Users in an array

tags.name: Get User Message Count
tags.description: Returns the amount of Messages from a specific User and the Social Media Source

tags.name: Send Messages to Topic
tags.description: Sends all of the messages in the request message in the 'messages' key to the topic specified in the value of 'topic_name'.

tags.name: Execute Query
tags.description: Executes a query based on the conditions passed in the response body.

tags.name: Container List
tags.description: List all of the containers that are running in Docker

tags.name: Container List by Ruleset
tags.description: List all of the containers that are running in Docker filtered by an ruleset ID

tags.name: Generate Docker Compose File
tags.description: Generates a docker-compose.yml file based on the details and rules specified for the ruleset

tags.name: Create Ruleset
tags.description: Creates the folders needed to store information about an ruleset and generates an ID for the ruleset

tags.name: Edit Ruleset
tags.description: Creates a details.json file which contains the details for the ruleset

tags.name: Delete Ruleset
tags.description: Deletes an ruleset based on the ruleset ID passed as a parameter

tags.name: Get Rulesets
tags.description: Prints details about every ruleset created

tags.name: Get Ruleset
tags.description: Prints details about a single ruleset specified by the rulesetId parameter

tags.name: Create Rules
tags.description: Creates a rules.json file using the request body as its contents

tags.name: Get Rules
tags.description: Gets the data from the rules.json file of a specified ruleset and outputs it as JSON

tags.name: Get Keyword File
tags.description: Gets the words from the keywords list indicated by the projectId and the list number (file_num) and outputs it as a JSON array

tags.name: Update Files
tags.description: Sends the list of words to the API and puts then into a keywords list file based on the projectId and the file_num
